name: Magic Ride: Rabbit's Broom
description:
'Magic Ride: Rabbit's Broom' is the first game from Magic Ride series where player playing as a little witch rabbit who work as a driver for every villager in Anima Village with his magic broom.

In this game, player will become a driver with magic broom and deliver the passanger to their destination without getting hit by ghost and spider so player with get tips from it. This game have purpose to introduce how public transportation especially the only one works.

Code, Assets, and everything in this game was made by me.
